meanings.definition: The quality or state of being new.
meanings.sent1: The newnesses of the toy made the child excited.
meanings.sent2: The store always attracts customers with the newnesses of its products.
meanings.sent3: The newnesses of the cake's flavor surprised everyone at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork captured the essence of newnesses in a world of tradition.
meanings.sent5: The morning dew glistened with the newnesses of the day.

meanings.definition: The act of introducing something new.
meanings.sent1: The company's success was due to its constant newnesses in the market.
meanings.sent2: Innovation fairs showcase the latest newnesses in technology.
meanings.sent3: The magician's newnesses in his tricks amazed the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her speech brought a wave of newnesses to the stale debate.
meanings.sent5: The chef's newnesses in the menu revitalized the restaurant.

meanings.definition: The state of being recently made, acquired, or experienced.
meanings.sent1: The newnesses of the car's paint job was evident in its shine.
meanings.sent2: The newnesses of the friendship brought joy to both of them.
meanings.sent3: The newnesses of the book's plot kept the readers engaged.
meanings.sent4: The newnesses of the idea sparked a lively discussion among the team.
meanings.sent5: The newnesses of the snowfall covered the town in a blanket of white.
